Text:
very funny movie, last section of d film is very interesting & have a conclusion very quickly !

it seems (until d end) that their marriage may not be possible ! there are so much problems arises !

but at the end all is well ! a simple solution made nice way to end d film ! great up !
many thanks SIRJI !

Congratulations on some wonderful uploads of late !! However, I would really appreciate if you could try to upload any of the following movies:

1) Sabse Bada Sukh - 1972 (Director - Hrishikesh Mukherjee)

2) Arjun Pandit - 1976 (Director - Hrishikesh Mukherjee)

3) Chalti Ka Naam Zindagi - 1982 (Director - Kishore Kumar)

4) Safed Jhooth - 1977 (Director - Basu Chatterjee)

All of these are classics and i bet - all your fans here would love them. Thanks in advance !!

my god..malikjee thanks a lot..feel like bowing in front of u..sorry was out for 4 days..so couldn't reply..thanks a lottt for this rarest gem and all the others..my god u hv flooded us with awesome pictures...yahoooooo!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks again for the wonderful movies that you upload! :) Keep up the good work!
